name: The 'Help Aaron Afford To Move Out On Time' Bundle
name_original: The 'Help Aaron Afford To Move Out On Time' Bundle
description:
◈◇◈◆◈◇◈

3 exclusive, unreleased games that I've been sitting on.

I'm not going to release these games outside of this collection, and I'm only selling this bundle for about 2 months (if you already bought it, you'll still be able to DL of course).

◈◇◈◆◈◇◈

If you know me well, you know that I've had a difficult, often-toxic living situation for the last few years, which I've been struggling to get myself out of.

If you don't know me well, Hi! I'm Aaron. I've been making games since 2004 but clearly I'm still broke. I'm trans and autistic (so in other words, extremely cool and hot)

My move-out date has been set in stone since late last year, but my work contract had to be pushed back repeatedly. So I need your help dealing with the gap in income 🙏🏻🥺

◈◇◈◆◈◇◈

In The Crags
    (3 hours)
    (audio by BB Tombo & Zack Web)

A face-melting narrative adventure-platformer with skateboarding elements.

Journey to the poisoned lands of Arka in this psychedelic, free-roaming adventure.

This is a very large, polished demo of a game I've been making since 2016. It's the vertical slice I was pitching to publishers. It tells roughly 1/3 of the complete story.

-----------------------
controls can be viewed / remapped for both kbd and gamepad in the options menu
-----------------------

◈◇◈◆◈◇◈

Subject Oriented
    (15 mins)

An experimental first person game in which you use hieroglyphics and usb 2.0 to speak with an AI living inside your body.

The AI has a complex mood system, which changes its dialogue and facial expression based on what you say. Changes in the AI's emotional states will change the symbols and organs inside of you.

This an "enhanced port" of an alt-control game I developed for a gallery show in 2015.
The original game had you use an alien controller with over 20 buttons and two 8-directional joysticks. This version has been modified to play on a keyboard.

-----------------------
controls can be viewed by pressing esc.
-----------------------

◈◇◈◆◈◇◈

Paint Boi
    (∞ hours)
    (audio by BB Tombo & Zack Web)

A sandbox art toy/game/tool inspired by Kid Pix and Electric Zine Maker. Create art using a the weirdest methods available.

Export your finished art as a high-res (2K) png!

-----------------------
controls can be viewed by pressing [space] on kbd or (A) on gamepad.
-----------------------

if you have an issue, the best and fastest way to get my attention is to hit me on twitter (@taeckerwyss) or discord (AaronTW#1795)

!!Mac Users!!
All these games run 100% on Mac OS! However, some newer macs get pissy if you try to open apps that haven't been signed in a special way. You can fix this this by changing an option in your systems settings. I know it's easy to fix in mac command line, but I don't own a mac.
